title: Fernando Batista
text:
Fernando Ariel Batista (born 20 August 1970) is an Argentine <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager who manages <a href="Argentina%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Argentina U23</a>.
Playing career.
Batista started his playing career with Argentine top flight side <a href="Argentinos%20Juniors">Argentinos Juniors</a>, where he made 134 league appearances and scored 4 goals. In 1997, Batista signed for <a href="Godoy%20Cruz%20Antonio%20Tomba">Godoy Cruz</a> in the Argentine second division. 
International career.
He represented <a href="Argentina%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Argentina</a> at the <a href="1989%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1989 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>.
Managerial career.
In 2018, Batista was appointed manager of <a href="Armenia%20national%20under-19%20football%20team">Armenia U19</a>. After that, he was appointed manager of <a href="Argentina%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Argentina U20</a>. In 2019, he was appointed manager of <a href="Argentina%20national%20under-23%20football%20team">Argentina U23</a>.
